title: Patrick Beverley, Jackie MacMullan, and Ryen Russillo
description:
Clippers guard Patrick Beverley joins The Woj Pod to discuss his path to the NBA, his reaction to the Clippers landing Kawhi Leonard and Paul George this summer (11:33), and his Chicago upbringing. Plus, ESPN's Jackie MacMullan and The Ringer's Ryen Russillo join the conversation to discuss the battle in LA for supremacy in the West (25:54), much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
